humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive carcinoma as 2.2 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the largest focus of the invasive carcinoma. In this report, the largest focus of the invasive ductal carcinoma is 2.2 cm, which falls in the T2 category (Tumor >20 mm but less than or equal to 50 mm in greatest dimension). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
